title: DirectX error giving me leaverbuster messages now
body: With all the random direct x errors that I keep getting I know have leaverbuster telling me i'm in low priority que. The game will randomly work one day and not the next day. I can even test the game out to see if it's working in a custom game (which is a pia to do) and it will work then I try an actual game and it doesn't work. I've sent a ticket and they told me to turn off windows game mode (which I did) and it worked for a little while after that so I thought it was fixed. Couple days later problem comes back, I go to check if it got turned back on and it didn't. What am I supposed to do now... This has been multiple weeks now... has the problem really not been found???

replies.body:
Constantly getting this error and resulting in a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) sounds pretty stressful, and I don't recommend playing anymore matchmade games until this is fixed up.  If you are using an AMD Graphics card, there's currently an issue with recent drivers and[ rolling back to a previous driver ](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/desktop/previous?os=Windows%2010%20-%2064)might help.  Otherwise, there might be other settings or driver problems causing this so going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide can help troubleshoot.

Go through those step, test it in a custom game, and let me know if you run into anymore issues.
